name: Lights Over Tesco Car Park
description:
Basically: Robert reported lights over the Tesco Car Park. Then he said an alien was coming to stay in his room. We're working out whether to believe him. Maybe you can help?

Lights Over Tesco Car Park runs at the Pleasance, Edinburgh, from 1-27th August, grab your tickets here: https://tickets.edfringe.com/whats-on/lights-over-tesco-car-park
